info.name: DVAPI
info.description:
DVAPI or Damn Vulnerable API is an intentionally vulnerable API created for showcasing the OWASP API Top 10 2023.

The OWASP API Top 10 is a list of the top 10 most critical security risks for APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) based on the Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP), a nonprofit organization focused on improving the security of web applications and APIs. The OWASP API Top 10 list is periodically updated to reflect the changing threat landscape and evolving best practices for API security.

exec: // Extract the bearer token from the response cookie
// Set the bearer token as an environment variable

request.description: Log in to DVAPI by providing your username and password.
Get your account details on this endpoint.

Get details of other user. Used when viewing other user's profile page.

Eg: `/api/user/jack`
Upload your profile pic and look cool.
Log out. Drink some water and breathe some fresh air.
Quickly add your tagline/note from an external source. (Hint: there is a character limit. Be cautious)
Get your saved note from here. The developer who worked on this has left the company and we are trying to find someone to maintain this code.
Add your secret note. Maybe a reminder, or anything. Be creative. Only you can read it.

Found a flag? Submit it here.

Format: `flag{fake_flag}`

request.description: API endpoint to get your challenge solve stats.
Scoreboard API. Get scores of all users.
Have issues working on a certain challenge? Worry not. Our admins are there to help. Simply write one ticket with all the issues and queries and we'll get back to you.
